h2_title: Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star
content: Quickly dodge to the side, and keep your distance as the embedded spear will explode after a short moment, sending rocks up all around it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star'.
The content is as follows:
Quickly dodge to the side, and keep your distance as the embedded spear will explode after a short moment, sending rocks up all around it.
